/**
 * @fileoverview This file defines the Navbar component for the application.
 * @description It provides navigation links and a logout button for authenticated users.
 */import React from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{logout,reset}from'../../features/auth/authSlice';import{AppBar,Toolbar,Typography,Button,Box}from'@mui/material';/**
 * @description Navbar component providing navigation and authentication actions.
 * @returns {JSX.Element} - The Navbar component.
 */import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const dispatch=useDispatch();const{user}=useSelector(state=>state.auth);/**
   * @description Handles the logout action.
   * Dispatches the logout thunk and redirects the user to the login page.
   * @returns {void}
   */const onLogout=()=>{dispatch(logout());dispatch(reset());navigate('/login');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppBar,{position:"static",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Toolbar,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",component:"div",sx:{flexGrow:1},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",style:{textDecoration:'none',color:'inherit'},children:"LMS"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{children:user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"inherit",onClick:onLogout,children:"Logout"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"inherit",component:Link,to:"/login",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"inherit",component:Link,to:"/register",children:"Register"})]})})]})});};export default Navbar;
